input.sentences: we arrived to find helium balloons in the ceiling even before the party started .
the balloon ribbons were pretty | though | hanging from above .
this brave man wore white to the party after labor day . what a rebel .
everyone was waiting for the music to start . we all love to dance .
finally the dj started the party and we danced for hours .
output.sentences: Maggie was ready to throw Ana's surprise party—there were dozens of balloons ready to drop down when Ana entered the room.
There were even purple ribbons -- Ana's favorite color.
But then, Maggie noticed Derek was there -- Ana's ex.
After she asked him to leave, the other guests headed to the dance floor.
